popup__descr__text: This is a timer for quick relaxation and reboot for 1 minute. You just need to start it, forget about everything for this short period and just enjoy the moment of peace. Allow yourself to take a short break, enjoy some peace and rejuvenate before continuing your work or school day. Use this timer to take control of your breath and release tension in your body and mind. You will be surprised how quickly you can enjoy relaxation and regain mental clarity after just one minute of rest.
text__switch: Every day is an opportunity to do something better than yesterday.
text__switch2: Success comes to those who are not afraid to take risks and make difficult decisions.
text__switch3: Every day is a new chance to do something beautiful, don't miss your chance.
text__switch4: Success does not come by itself, it is achieved through hard work and perseverance.
text__switch5: Do not look for easy ways, difficulties are an opportunity for growth and development.
text__switch6: Always follow your dreams and don't stop halfway.
text__switch7: Never forget that you are capable of more than you think.
text__switch8: Strong people survive in difficult situations.
text__switch9: Don't let negativity affect your life.
text__switch10: Life is a journey, enjoy it.
